AlphaGUIShader Class Reference

This class is a GUI shader that changes the alpha values of the components it is applied to. More...

Classes

class  ThisAttributeMap
 internal More...

Detailed Description

This class is a GUI shader that changes the alpha values of the components it is applied to.

void AlphaGUIShader::constants ( float  t1,
float  t2,
float  alpha,
float  speed = 0.f 
)

constants are t1 : the clip position where the alpha blend starts t2 : the clip position where the alpha blend ends t3 : the maximum alpha value speed : the speed at which a transition to a new alpha value occurs

float AlphaGUIShader::currentAlphaParam ( void   )  [inline]

This method returns the current alpha T-value.

It is a value between 0 and 1, representing the current position between 0.f and the alpha set in the component's colour property

PyObject* AlphaGUIShader::get_py_reset (  )  [inline]

bool AlphaGUIShader::processComponent ( SimpleGUIComponent &  component,
float  dTime 
) [virtual]

This method processes a GUI component, applying this shader to its vertices.

Parameters:
component The component to process
dTime The delta time for the current frame of the application
